column4: hi, I have a question. I've been using irssi IRC client lately, set on my friend's computer. Have been connecting to the session using PuTTy. However, I've quit from irssi and cannot get back. when I type /screen -r [screenadress] I shows I've got 2 screens attached. Don't know what to do. Could you help me?
could anyone help?
could anyone help?
I don't really know a lot about screen, but isn't there a way you can specify which session to reattach?
there is, it shows I've got 2 attached sessions, but I don't know if it is possible/how to get to them
also I don't know how to start a new session
yeah, a know, I'm really a beginner
the -r option is for reattaching, isn't it? So to start a new session you just leave it out... I think.
and what can I do with the 'attached' screen?
Is the session attached on your friend's computer still?
AFAIK you need to detach it from there first
it seems so
with -d
won't it delete the session?
uhm, I'm not sure. I didn't think so but I haven't used screen in that way.
I only have one computer :S
Was there a split earlier?
oh
somehow I've made it xD
probably will start a new session
I've found a command to start irssi once again, so I'll start a new session.
thanks for your attention
